attributes.action: Stop landlords and estate agents credit checking potential tenants of private housing
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The private housing rental business in this country is a joke, Normal working people who have bad credit will not get a place to live because the rental agents want to credit check people and charge around £200+ for the privilege it is wrong as you are NOT asking for any credit as you pay rent in advance.
This practice has to stop because it is fraud

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
